title: 3/21 PBE update is now up

embed.description: The PBE has been updated! Today's update kicks off the 7.7 PBE cycle and includes new skins and more! Continue reading for more information! ( Warning : PBE Content is tentative and subject to change - what you see below may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers at the end of the cycle!

One of the splash artists on ChampUp. She worked on Blade Mistress Morgana, Royal Guard Fiora, Barbarian Sion, all 3 Karma Splashes, Tundra Warwic, Leopard Nidalee, just to name a few

I still hate the new Ahri splash just as much as I did the day they forced it through the PBE. Even though they had twice the amount of time it takes to make a brand new splash to fix what was wrong with the first attempt, they gave us something worse (the face is still horrible,) and didn't want to miss the deadline or whatever happened. 

Now we have to wait for her VGU for a new splash, and even then, since it's been updated already, it probably won't happen, and if it does, I half expect them to give her blue eyes instead of yellow. (Yes, I'm also still very upset about A New Dawn.)
